data.text: 25 turns to break 120 objects that take 2 matches next to it to break it. 240/25 = a minimum of six matches next to breakable objects each turn. Don't even get me started on the mail boxes or magic hats. Good clean fun for about 400 levels then it's pay or wait out the RNG. You will eventually win any level even without using power ups or money, I hardly ever do, but get ready to just lose a bunch till it gives you a pity win for certain levels.

To be honest ..I love this game BUT.. IN order to move forward and get to the highest levels you have to spend a lot of money it's crazy. You don't get enough coins rewards for each level you bit,but if you lose ..you have to pay 900 coins firts try,1900 second ,and like that increasing untill you end up broke and have to buy more coins .

ADD "MOVE REWIND" - My name is Aaron this is a great game! I like playing it a lot there's a few things that could improve but I'm just hoping one of them could be adding like a "MOVE REWIND" let's say you make a move and you messed up by accidentally tapping the screen or just didnt like the way things played out, you can then use you power up "MOVE REWIND" and try again.

The game is called FREE with in-app purchases. You're gonna get to levels that require power ups in order to pass. That said, the power ups don't work every time. For example, the dynamite keg plus rocket is supposed to launch 3 rockets both horizontally and vertically. Well, only 1 rocket gets counted on these larger targets. That's just one example. Device type doesn't seem to matter for this complaint. It's either a built in scam, or they never did a beta test.

I really enjoyed the game at first. However, the higher your level gets the more impossible it is to pass those levels unless you pay for more coins to help. I can tell you I've spent several times trying to pass certain levels without paying and I almost always end up getting 1 more hit and I would have completed the level. I like complex games but it takes the fun out of it sometimes when you have do the same level so many time or pay to progress.

Don't waste your time! Once you get to around level 1000 strange things start to happen. When you have a candyball, at times it will mysteriously change into a rocket or just disappear. I have had turns disappear, not getting items I am suppose to get when I line up 4 or 5 of the same things. I've also had a yellow item just appear at the bottom of the line when there was no yellow in the whole line. Some levels do that.I'm so glad i didn't spend any money buying things in this game. Good luck

Good game. Helps keep u occupied. Only issue is that it is a pay to win game. The number of times I have only 1 item left to clear with less than 900 coins is insane. The game cheats so often, u get used to it. But super light ball is the biggest scam. Takes 10 plays to get, but you lose it with one fail, so when you have only 1 item left, you are forced to buy coins or lose the super ball. Good scam...supposed to make the game easier but when you need rockets going down, 99% go sideways...smh

HONEST REVIEW: You can play game with no ads. After spending a few hundred dollars I can say it's rigged. If you pay to play the levels are far easier than a non paying player. The other thing they do is rig it if you have paid for coins you will pass level easier with one exception, they always make it where you need to hit ONE last object to pass level, hoping you'll use coins you paid for to finish instead of repeating level. They are such SCAMMERS! I quit giving them my money.

Fun at first. Higher levels are impossible to beat unless using every booster you have and then some. Some levels are well over 80 tries. Bonus levels to get coin become sparse. *games* to get boosters are impossible to get through as you have to beat levels on your 1st attempt repeatedly in order to win anything. After level 3000, money is what seems needed to beat any levels. Currently been stuck on one level for a week. This game is a joke.

I gave this game 3 stars because I do enjoy the game. But you hardly ever save the king! That is what was supposed to make this game unique. I am going to keep it for little bit longer but I think I'm gonna be done with this game soon. Good for someone who's looking for a classic drop the block game. All of the adds say there are absolutely no ads! It's true. I think I really would like this game IF you could save the king more often. Like every other level or so. The graphics are also smooth.

BEWARE! Great game.... But as you get to the higher levels, the super hard are just that. It's frustrating to play it over and over and just keep losing. Then the ad to buy coins which you know will get you thru until the next super hard challenge. Sadly same complaint by so many. I'm not going to waste money when everything is so expensive right now to get thru a level. This one's on my chopping block.

Play at your own risk! Like many other reviewers, I got super addicted to this game because it's fun & saying. However, VERY quickly, the game makes it so you literally can't win levels without buying coins. If you want to keep playing, you have to buy coins. Very often just to get one more turn that you needed to win, and they charge 900 coins which is literally insane. It's infuriating. I finally had to delete the app because I refused to buy more coins and literally can't beat the next level.

Can't progress without paying after reaching a certain level; otherwise, it's a fun distraction. Play eventually becomes so slow that you quit playing or pay to progress. Not fun after that, pretty much have to pay or spend a couple days working on each level. The combos start acting weird too, not sure if it's a glitch or by design because you can't find any documentation to explain anything. Whenever I start the game it automatically removes 2 lives without playing the game.

False advertisement. This game is nothing to what was advertised on the Google Play Store. The ads were games that involves saving the king such as finishing a puzzle as a dragon slithers through the tunnel before it gets to him-- that is not in this app. All it is is basic puzzles. If I could rate -10 for the false advertisement, I would. Don't waste your time on this game.

Ok, so this review may seem redundant, but it's true. The game starts off fun but eventually forces you to pay for coins or something else to help win a level. They do this by waiting until you have one block left to clear but no matches or power ups near the block. Once you buy more power-ups or coins, it consistently makes you lose to use them up to buy more. At first, I thought it was just me, but after so many levels, I figured out it was the game. Play at your own risk!

*** Updated review bc they have changed the algorithm making it impossible to beat levels unless you pay. AND they have changed all of the "packages" you can buy from $2.99 to now $19.99. AND when you pay, all of the sudden you win level after level then BOOM, 900 coins for the last 5 moves....and you do that...the suddenly the coins you bought are gone after a few levels. I have to give it to the games developers. It's highly addictive and you will spend serious $$$.

Edit: I donated a little cash to the game, because no ads is great. I've reached level 1093, used almost everything that I have strategically, but I'm not going to pay for every level. Get in every event to win powerups and coins. The events give nice rewards, but you have to use what you have, to get new ones. As for the people complaining of a paywall for a "no ads" game, if you expect a game to be completely free, you're very unrealistic.

Tbh, super boring. I've yet to catch ads or glitches like some reviews mention, but it's nothing like the ads of the game make it out to be. Once every maybe 15 levels I'm guessing, you get a puzzle like it shows in the ads. Otherwise it's just a match 3 game. I'd suggest offering customization options with decorating at the absolute least. Uninstalling due to false advertising, boring gameplay, and to make space for better games, like Cat Snack Bar, which has a super cute Halloween event rn.

Fun at first, but to get anywhere in the game without spending real money is impossible. I will admit that at level 1,579 I have spent roughly 30 bucks to play. However, now Im finding levels nearly impossible to pass without powerups and Im sick of spending $$. I find it very discouraging to lose a level multiple times by 1 or 2 moves over and over. Its like the algorithm prevents one from succeeding. The game has been relatively fun up until about the last 500 levels. Uninstalled!!

I got this game to play the challenges displayed in the ads. I'm at level 272 & have done maybe 5 of those. At this point in order to win a level, I need boosters to win or coins to continue playing to win and even then, it's a hit or miss. It's a very redundant game and I've gotten bored after a couple of weeks. Keep in mind, you will be encouraged to independently purchase boosters, coins, hearts, etc. You can get hearts from a team but all things credited within the game is slow to get.

This game is fun for the first few days, however, as others have mentioned, the stages quickly become too difficult to complete without the use of power-ups. No amount of skill or luck will circumvent this very intentional level design. While aesthetically pleasing to draw you in, the allure quickly fades as that realization sinks in. Developers have become so engrossed in maximizing profitablity they seem to have forgotten the entire point of playing is to have fun. I can't recommend this game.

It's a really enjoyable game. Though as you get to the higher levels it becomes more difficult to play since you have less number of moves to finish. Sometimes I have to rely on luck giving me the right combination of matches to finish a level. Definitely harder if you don't use in-app purchases of extra moves or power-ups/support items.

I honestly love this game. Me and my daughter on the same team. NO ADS!!! I enjoy the team involvement and interaction. BUT unless you pay for lives, you could get stuck on a ridiculously difficult level, impossible to beat for days on end! There are currently over 1000 players stuck on level 8001... Makes you wonder? I'm only on level 3639, but with only 26 moves available, I need to smash over 40 obstacles. It's extremely frustrating.

Fun game. I love the no ads feature. To many games have to much adds. On the sidenote your ingame coins will quickly drop once you reach higher level. You will be without coins , boosters , and helping items realy quick because the game gets harder to play really fast. At that point the game screams : we need your money if you want to continue your growth

I have downloaded this game few days back and true to their words, there are absolutely no ads. Not even a single one. But that means, you can't get extra moves for level by watching ad and have to sacrifice 900 coins every time, if you need just 1 or 2 more moves to clear the level. 900, imo, is way too much. I am stuck at level 371 right now, and the levels are becoming increasingly difficult. But the game is great, addictive and enjoyable.

Have personally never played a single second of this game but the ads that continuously keep popping up throughout my favourite game that I started playing about an hour ago (which is definitely not this game, let me tell you) piss me off. I downloaded the game just so I could write a review. I'm just trying to enjoy building my hotel and all of a sudden this stupid king keeps popping up on the screen. Also, the graphics are not as good as the lads in the ad want to make it seem. Thank you :)

Good game but issue is we can't exchange cards freely. The ban in place for exchanging golden cards makes no sense and even worse, for limited time you can only exchange specific cards. Teams and friends would be playing it much more effectively if this was changed. Also, I paid for spins couple of times and it turned out to be rigged. Last time I wanted to collect 15🍀to get 11k spins and it didn't give me a single 🍀so the money was wasted. Lesson learned, no more money for the game.

For anyone reading this: this game is great fun and addictive. But be warned, some levels are ridiculous to try and complete, and you'll be stuck repeating them for literal days, exhausting every power up and coin you've accumulated until the algorithm kicks in and let's you beat it just to prevent you from getting completely disinterested. If you're willing to tolerate that, then it can be a fun time waster.

It's like candy crush. The ads are a mini game within this game called Kings Nightmare. It's odd because Kings Nightmare could be all this game is and I would love it. It also doesn't seem to have any ads. So not bad at all, but the mini game is why I downloaded and it's few and far between the candy crush base game.

Love the game, HATE the "areas". I am now stuck on level 8000 until I complete all "areas" and it takes forever!! There should be a skip button, to just finish the area and not have to wait for every single item to get placed and then wait to see it all together. I just want to play the game!

Impossible to win without spending money!!! I love this game but its becoming way to difficult to win. Levels are becoming harder and with less moves, you can only pass by paying the extra moves and sometimes its not enough and requests to pay 1900 coins. After spending quite a lot of real money, I think its time to leave this game for good. The graphics are amazing and it is actually a good game, but unfortunately they just want our money, shame!!!!

One of the few games where spending money is not necessary to get into higher levels. A consistent good balance between reward and challenge. The utter lack of advertisements also greatly assists in the enjoyment of the game.

Removed from leadership from the team I created several years ago for no reason. I was not notified that it would happen, or why it was happening. I logged in, and poof, I was kicked from being the leader. You can't even contact them, because the removed the "contact us" button they say to use in the support section. I was away for 3 weeks with severe Shingles on my face, and in my eyes. I literally couldn't play the game for 3 weeks. And I'm punished for it.

I feel cheated. I downloaded this game because it looked awesome and different on the adverts. I thought you had to save the king by solving puzzles. Although those levels do exist, they are rare and nearly all the other levels are just a standard match game. Really disappointed by thisz the advertising is misleading so I am now uninstalling. If you made the game where every level was saving the king, you would have the best pizzle game ever.

They emphasize how there are no commercials that is because they monetize the game far more by making it impossible to pass certain levels without paying real money to buy boosters or coins to continue playing that level over again!!! The fact of no commercials means you just have to pay rather than watch a commercial to receive rewards! Worse yet when you're doing well The game will change its color dropping probabilities causing you to lose and spend more money! Total scam stay away

So this game does not have adverts, this is true.You fly thru the early levels really quickly & play side games,win coins & items you then use to help you get thru hard or extra hard levels.Unfortunately, very soon once you've used up all your coins & tools you CANNOT pass the hard/extra hard levels unless you purchase the special items.The normal gameplay makes it impossible.So there's the catch.And it's not like the adverts.It's candy crush with a help the king v rarely.V disappointing.

As of 03-15-24 this game Does Not have 100 New Boards!! I have been playing Royal Match for over a year, & that is just NOT TRUE! After you play all the levels, it gives you 1 New Level at a time. After you complete each New Level, you go to the Royal League & keep playing that over & over Not earning stars or making rooms or Airports. Just competing with other players to be #1 after a week or so then you get 1 more New Board. Hope this Helps.

Game doesn't play by its own rules in shameless cash grab. As levels progress, I'm noticing more and more frequently that tiles that are falling no longer match up properly. For example, if 6 red tiles are falling in a row after matching tiles below them, they no longer make a disco ball. Instead, they'll match in pairs of 3. This is, I feel, cheating me and forcing me to spend real money. Put another way, unfairly artificially increasing the "difficulty" to punish players. Shady AF!

The only reason I downloaded this game was so I could rate it at the lowest possible score, because of the incessant, invasive and annoying ads for it on other apps that I have. As soon as I fill out this rating I am unsubscribing. The ads are way too long, unceasing and ridiculous in their ubiquitous nature. It is for this specific reason that I will never download this game, or any other game put out by the developer. The ads for it are intrusive and I for one are sick of them.

FALSE ADVERTISING!! This app was one of the very annoying ads I had to watch while playing other games. The ads promoted a game of solving puzzles to save a king, but that's less than 1% of the game. i didnt know the public could be so blatantly lied to. Have i just been lucky all my life that most things have worked as expected? I guess I can return or not use what doesn't work, so I would suggest you pass on this app if you're looking for the game it is advertised to be.

If you don't mind being on the same level for days at a time, this game is for you. The push for micro transactions is blatantly obvious. RM can go from fun to frustrating extremely fast... if you let it. I don't know what the max level is but I saw some ppl at level 5,000. You'll be stuck on level 150 for days, dodging requests to buy gold or packages, wondering how in the heck people even got to level 1,000 let alone 5,000. Don't stress level completion but se this app to pass time.

No ads, fast gameplay, lots of power ups, plenty of events, overall it is a fun game, I just wish there was a "complete room" button if you already have enough stars to fully decorate the area you are working on. I have played through so many without decorating to keep up with races and events that I've got 1000 stars to spend but each item has to be dealt with individually instead of all at once. re-skinned candy crush but done alittle more smoothly

Deceiving people with a different game on the ads only to download and find out it's just a normal match 3 game isn't really the best approach you should use. I saw the ad and was really excited only to download the game and now I'm left with disappointment. Why happened to helping the king out of the water?or clearing the way until the snake catches up?Until you start being honest, bye cos I already have a match 3 game that I enjoy 😒🙄🙄👎👎👎👎👎

Best match 3 game I've ever played. ZERO ads, keeps your place even if your device suddenly powers off, play never seems to get dull or repetitive as they are continually adding different bonuse games and challenges, plus its simply an addictive, entertaining and fun way to enjoy your spare time.

DECEITFUL ADVERTISING!!! Marketed as a puzzle game it turns out it's one of those gay building a community type of game, with the puzzles being occasional mini games. Two stars is terribly generous!!! Don't waste your time; unless you want a game that's not fun and is a fake-out

My favorite game! I have this game on several devices. As you pass levels it gets more challenging. It's good to play in teams to get team prizes and rewards. I have earned 10s of thousands of credits and lost it all, I've paid for lives and boosters, but I don't care, It's the only game I'd pay for because I rely on this game to unwind. I love it!

I came to Google play to leave an unsolicited glowing review. NO ADS, EVER. FREE TO PLAY. Great graphics, cool puzzles, even a supportive and fun community experience. I've been playing over a year and still haven't spent a dime on this game (@ Level 7950). If you're good at solving puzzles, want an occasional challenge, don't like ads, then this is the game for you. In reply to folks who feel the game is rigged and is pay to play, did you ever consider that you're just not good at it?

At first I loved this game, the concepts and team play is cool! But unfortunately this game is a money pit! I mean a real cash grab for the developers! Not leaving much at all for the players but a huge bill if you want to do well!👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽 P. S. I preferred the super propellers I don't like the super light ball! I also don't like the way the game doesn't allow you to be strategic by forcing all your weapons out at the start of the round!👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

It's very addictive, great there are no ads too, but also so frustrating when time after time you don't even come close to beating a level. You've used all your boosters and resources, so now praying for a miracle lol. Then bingo! 100 tries later you blitz it with moves to spare. Sorry but I won't be tempted to spend money to progress so may eventually kick it into touch.

Game frozen in opening loading screen! After using it most all morning Thursday with no issues, but Thursday afternoon game started freezing during the loading sequence, and has not passed that since. I tried closing & reopening the program and doing the same with my phone & restarting. It is now Friday evening. I'm assuming there was an update that created an issue and froze the game. If this isn't resolved quickly, I will uninstall it, even though I found it relaxing to play and enjoyed it.

fun game until you have to redo a level again and again and again... what is with these kind of games to put a limit of moves? can't it be a fun game with no rage? it's starting to piss me off when I have to do a level dozens of times... you should be able to enjoy this game and have fun without feeling frustrated...

Love the game, but you need to be disciplined in not buying your way to the win. The algorithms are set for almost impossible wins without buying... But don't spend your hard earned money to play a game that's rigged for your failure. Back out and come back after a few hours.

True that this game is nothing what comes in those pop up ads but if you like a puzzle game, it is amazing. Great puzzles keeps you engaged and let me tell you they are not that easy...you just have to figure it out. I have not paid a single penny and I am on highest level 8001 and literally play along as the new updates come. It gives so many mini games to earn the coins and powers and that alone can let you play forever.

The Apps is fine, but I like to ask some questions about the annual increase of the premium every year. 2022/2023 - Paid $167. 2023/2024 - Paid $208. 2024/2025 - Renewal pending bill - $226? Too high increase of Bill. As a senior, and AARP member, I am requesting for a good discount from my current Renewal Premium. Kindly respond to enable me make immediate payment less the discount. Thank you.

I should have known better; the ads are very misleading. They make it seem you have to save the king at every level. But no, you only get a 'save the king' game every 10 levels. Otherwise it's just like any other match game. Not worth it in my opinion. Delete.

Fun for the first 100 levels, then it becomes almost impossible to pass levels with acceptable rounds (some you have to pass 30/40 times...). Usual little mindless game that drives you to buy so enjoy it until you get bored with it and then trash it.

I love the game but the chat support has been terrible. I wanted to save my progress but it wasn't working, and the support people said they needed to escalate the issue. then I waited for 1.5h, nudging every minutes, and they never even responded to the nudges. horrible user experience

While I love that there are no ads, it's really annoying that you can be stuck on one level for a very long time because you refuse to purchase coins or power-ups. I'll probably uninstall soon if things don't change.

I really like this game. However, when you invite people to play Dragon Nest, you should be able to accept or decline that person. Some people accept the invite and then don't play and you end up playing for the points on your own to get the grand prize. In the meanwhile , the person who doesn't play still collects boosters that I win.

Fun but nothing like the ad. They show these scenarios where you rescue the king but I'm on level 152 and I've had maybe 4 or 5 of those scenarios. The levels are rigged. You literally cannot beat them unless you have multiple boosters. They decide how many boosters you get. And it never fails that right as you get your last move all of a sudden multiple boosters will drop into the field. There will be multiple games where no boosters for a while forcing you to use up your moves so you lose.

It's just the ad, but, watching someone's attempt to rescue the king and fail as the king is drowned, or eaten by a snake, or buried by a landslide, I find this game, and games like it, where to lose the game ending with death, quite disturbing.

I can not open up this game on my phone. Are there any updates? Is it just me and my phone that's having a problem? The game is addictive, and I've been doing well without spending money. I'm in a group too that plays everyday, so we earn extra coins and we do okay in group involved events. Please help! I don't want to uninstall my app and start again.

The game can be fun but the levels get much harder quickly and then you either have to repeat the level for several days or spend real money on buying power ups. Yes there are no ads but the game is very repetitive after a while and not much fun

I didn't make it past level 3. There are no fun puzzles, it's just basic Candy Crush knockoff matching! The ads are a lie. Or maybe you have to get further for the puzzles, but if that's the case, they shouldn't make them the main focus of the ads.

A HORRIBLE SCAM designed to make you spend money once you get to the higher levels. I am at level 1364 but@ level 850 I was spending to stay in the game. Now no longer spending money and it's impossible to win. Most levels only pay 25 -40 coins, including really hard levels. some pay more but most don't. Costs 900 coins to stay in the game for 5 more moves but you only win 40. Major ripoff! UNINSTALL - ITS LIQUID CRACK!

Great game but they waste your time fixing up a castle, if I want to do that I would play a game where you fix stuff and all this was a match game , plus after you are out of lifes there is a timer so u can't play any more until the 4 or 5 minutes are up , I tbink its a waste of time, ill move. On to a better one as why do I want to set and wait 5 minutes to play again, just start playing a different one delete it

I know you have to make your money, but really, I can play the same game for 24-48 hours without moving forward unless I spend money! And I play 10 hours a day , but ready to move on to other games that are more reasonable to play ! Up to level 798 and see how the game is set up to win Mmm or spend money on the game to win ! After playing the same game for 30 plus time there such be some competition rewards to get you to advance !
I spend way too much $ in this game! It's addictive and I have a lot of fun playing, so I don't mind. My favorite parts: great sound effects, no ads, great team, challenging without being too hard.

Rating 1 star because although its a fun addictive way to pass time they rig it so you gotta pay money to pass levels by buying coins or powerup packages. Certain touches are misread or not recognized by the game causing false moves and THE POPUPS ARE REALLY ANNOYING!!! if no fix soon i will uninstall.

This game is not the game you make it appear to be in your ads. Deceptive and misleading. For me that's an automatic uninstall. If your ads don't accurately portray what the game really is, in this case just another boring Match 3, you don't deserve my game play and definitely don't deserve my money.

Ok, well constructed game and fun to play but, this game will bleed your money dry! The reward payout is next to nothing and does not allow you to save coins to buy power ups of which you need to get through the game because it gets incredibly difficult and down right sluggish. It's almost impossible to play the side games to win power ups. I'm on level 1270 and am quitting as I had purchased coins and got double charged. It's regrettable that this company is just that greedy.

Sorry I waisted my time. Got to level 1211 and yup sure nuff the strange cheating began. Taking out my super light ball every time I got it, making things go off when the move I made was on the opposite side. Items change from one thing to another. I really needed a game like this. If the programmers hadn't programmed it to cheat the game would be pretty great. Sadly uninstalling.

Got to level 138 before ever spending a dime. -1 star because ads are slightly misleading and they do try to push you toward buying things. You can 100% get by without paying though and they create fair opportunities for you to earn coins, powerups, etc. Fun game

Once you get very far you can't win without paying...you need to hit some objects 3 or 4 times and with so many objects you can't....but pay the 900 coins for extra moves and it's easier I'm about done...I've spent enough
not enough of king's nightmares. this is the main reason I downloaded the app. the rewards are subpar compared to the cost. it's okay for mindless passing of time. actually more frustrating than fun

Oh no. The game is rigged /pre-programmed so that you are forced to use certain game elements and/or you are sabotaged by moves from using your in-game gimmicks (aka power-ups). Also, if you complete Magic cauldron, remaining elixirs are converted into hammers supposedly. I had 100 remaining elixirs and they got converted into 3 royal hammers!!!! I've spent a little in the game shop, but after this latest trick, screw royal match. Not spending another penny and the developers can eat snot 🤣😡🫡
Pretty entertaining. challenging but not impossible to beat without spending money and NO ADS! Also, I like to just play the music in the background and pretend it's a soundtrack for my life lol!

nothing like the ads. But worse, it suffers from the same fault of so many similar games (cundy crash, shitescapes etc) in that it is only fun for a while and later rounds become so difficult there is no pleasure in playing anymore.

My app is on freeze mode it will pull up on the screen but never open the actual game app for me to play and I'm on such a extremely high level and I'm can't uninstall it cause my progress will be lost the game is connected to Facebook which o no longer have access to I've emailed the support center but no one wishes to respond PLEASE FIX THIS ISSUE THIS TO ME IS AN EXPENSIVE LOSS FOR I HAVE DROPPED SOME MONEY ON THE SPECIAL DEALS TO MAKE IT TO LEVEL 4,445 SMDH

Misleading ads, game is nowhere like what the ads imply Game is buggy, sometimes you make a sequence and you don't get the powerup that's supposed to be created. No way to contact support via the game and their support email refuses to help unless we contact them via the game
FALSE ADVERTISING. This game is not at all what I wanted when I downloaded it. I wanted to save the king as it was advertised but instead the King appears once. Very disappointing. I'm deleting it.

Game is really fun, I took a break about 6 months ago or more, reinstalled the other day and have had little to no connection to internet. I'm using fiber, 5g sitting near router and still no connection even after several restarts. Wife playing game also with same problem. I am uninstalling .. not fun .

**DON'T SPEND YOUR MONEY ON THIS GAME** it is is set up to win and lose. There have been times that I had five in a row and did not get the super ball! Same with the TNT, helicopters and arrows. The squares and rows disappear but you don't get your items to help as it should. I am guessing that is built into the game program so you will lose and hopefully spend your money to buy more lives and things. The game is okay but I won't spend any money on it!

Appeared to be a decent game, though the move limits are annoying. Then, it added timed mode which completely ruins the game. Would be awesome if there was a setting to eliminate both but those features remove all the enjoyment from the game. Very sigh that the dev took a great concept and ruined it.

Too heavily engineered to make you spend real money. The " make it fun for everyone" doesn't wash. You get paltry reward for a lot of effort. One extremely concerning thing is that you can no longer access support from the game. I'm not the only one to notice this. So , if you pay real money and something goes wrong you've lost your money. That's not on in a game where booster effect reduced, one item left increasingly common, anything to make you spend. Unfair practice

If you've come from an ad to play this game you'll be disappointed. The ad games are rare, it's mostly just match 3 type games without the King. There are no ads which is why I stuck with it. You can't have it on 2 devices, well you can, but your progress on the first device will be lost. I don't know if you download onto 2 devices at the same time if they can be synced to each other. Whenever you get about 150 levels in its just luck and grinding away to win a new level unless you pay.

Definitely this game is the best three match there is and I have played many of the other games. I think the only other thing in game I would like is the ability to chat ( or just leave messages ) with other players not on your team ( your team has the chat board ).

It's really cute. I just wish that I could have a separate place where you can choose what you play. Like one game where you can just play the game without having to meet using so few number of matches, just play it on your own or choose to play it as it is now? I would like to see it designed with a choice.

Fun game, but the coin rewards are not enough. The ads are false. Yes, there are no ads, but the Save the King levels are only every 50 levels or so. Otherwise it's just a standard match-3 game. So this is super misleading. And my goodness, the ads for this game are so incredibly annoying! And this game is EXPENSIVE. The boosters and coins are not worth the money and neither is the royal pass. Also there should be an extra moves reward of sorts.
data.replyText:
Hello there, we appreciate your suggestion about Royal Match.

Our development team is constantly working on improving the features of the game, and your feedback will be shared with our game developers.

Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback and help us improve Royal Match.

data.text: Gameplay has improved a bit. Grind levels lately seem to offer temp infinite replays, do you don't have playzones of "play, fail 5 times, go wait 20 minutes for next game energy". The KING DREAM stuff somewhat complies with the current advertising. Level 190 is where you'll hit the heavy grind. They have lots of secondary challenges, which are okay, but after you hit the grind of difficult level + time wait nonsense, it gets intensely boring. Upside is no ADFARM nonsense. About 1 days fun.

I really like this game, it is a good time-passer. The only problem I have with this game is that you only have 5 chances to pass a level without having to wait half an hour for 1 life, or asking your team (if you're in one) for lives, which will get you lives quicker than waiting, but by the time I realize I have been given lives I already have gotten them all back. I understand that this game has to make money somehow, but I would like for the game creators to give us as consumers more lives.

I downloaded because allegedly you were matching to save the king. It's nothing like the ads or the sponsored videos from creators. I haven't saved the king in 50 levels already. He must be caught somewhere because he is nowhere on these levels. Higher levels are impossible! You can use every bonus, every rocket and lose 45 times in a row. Ive been stuck on this same level for 3 weeks, playing once or more a day so I deleted the game. I'm over it.

I really enjoy this match three game. The levels are well thought out, the side events for additional power ups or coins are fun, the "King's Nightmare"s are a nice little break (you can do them for a few coins or skip them without penalty). And there are NO ads. I do with the ads FOR the game were more accurate about the actual game play. I was pleasantly surprised but others are likely to be disappointed.

If you want a normal match-3 game, go for it. But the ads promised me a different game, where you match-3 and help save the king from various stuff, which is there but it's only there once every 5 (or more) levels. I'm currently at level 15 and I've got only one such level till now. I don't get why developers advertise the game as something it's not. Like, if you are advertising one game, have the guts to make that game the whole game. You clearly can make such games, given that one level.

A lot of fun for a while and totally ad free which is great. Unfortunately, once you reach later levels, it becomes near impossible without power-ups and once your free power-ups are finished, you're almost forced to spend money or wait for ages just to clear one level. Also a lot of false advertising on it as the ONLY ads I've ever seen for the game are the Kings Nightmares, which are probably max 5% of the levels. The rest are typical match 3 levels and can get repetitive quickly.

So this game is fun to pass the time, but it is also completely rigged to make you spend money. The number of times levels end with just one more thing to complete is insane. Also, if you watch closely when lots of stuff is going on, there are combinations that are made to give you power ups that the game ignores. The AI running in this game is clearly designed to get you just close enough to finishing so you feel like you have to pay to continue.

I give only three stars because even though I enjoy the game it is almost impossible to pass so e levels without spending money. And when you clear a level you get the same amount of rewards. It should be more as you get higher. It just gets you annoyed after a while that you are getting higher and higher but you still get the same amount of rewards. Update. Here I am still playing hoping to see better rewards for getting higher and spending so much money! And.... nothing. You still get the same
data.replyText:
Hello there, we appreciate your suggestion about Royal Match.

Our development team is constantly working on improving the game's features, and your feedback will be shared with our game developers.

Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback and help us improve Royal Match.

data.text: Love, Love, Love this game. No ads, never forced to buy anything, great graphics, minimal system issues. Great for all ages and FREE! Would like to see daily prizes for frequent playing.
Fun game, but after getting up in levels, they make it impossible to win without spending money. I spent over 20 dollars just to beat 3 levels. I will go back to good ole Candy Crush.

The game is a total rubbish. I downloaded the game from their ads because it looks interesting but when I start to play the game, it the opposite of what the ads describes. So far that I have been playing the game there is not a single level where I have to save any king. Everything I've been seeing so far is just arranging rooms through sliding of objects and it is so annoying. Like! why the heck will you not do what the ads says?
